descriptionEn: Over the next six months, three key aspects deserve attention: the user experience of Windows and mobile versions, developers' acceptance of ARIA labels, and whether Google will accelerate the integration of more aggressive AI features into Chrome. After all, the battle for AI browsers has just sounded its first drum.

title: MIT工程师解决生物反应器及其他行业中的细胞粘附难题
description: 该团队通过电化学生成气泡使细胞从表面分离，这项技术有望加速吸碳藻类的培育进程并推动拯救生命的细胞疗法发展。
titleZh: MIT工程师解决生物反应器及其他行业中的细胞粘附难题
titleEn: MIT engineers solve cell adhesion challenges in bioreactors and other industries
descriptionZh: 该团队通过电化学生成气泡使细胞从表面分离，这项技术有望加速吸碳藻类的培育进程并推动拯救生命的细胞疗法发展。
descriptionEn: The team used electrochemical generation of bubbles to detach cells from surfaces, a technology that could speed up the process of growing carbon-absorbing algae and advance the development of life-saving cell therapies.
